1001.title: Registration & morning Coffee
1001.description: Get your badge, coffee, enjoy talking with tech edicts around

1005.title: GDG DevFest Ukraine 2015 Opening
1005.description: Official start of the conference. Greatings from the organizers, sponsors and partners.

1006.title: Afterparty & Networking
1006.description:
Afterpaty is a great time to have some fun and meet new people.

Location: Club Arsenal Market, [Pidvalna St 5](http://club.arsenalmarket.lviv.ua/uk/contacts/)

Free shot for all DevFest attendees included.

Don't forget to bring your badge.

1007.title: Conference closing and contest winners announcements
1007.description: Make sure you won't miss closing ceremony, all gifts from out sponsors and partners will find their owners during this session.

101.title: Material Design on Custom Views
101.description:
There are various widgets to create user interfaces in Android Framework. Using these widgets is a starting point but they are not enough to create awesome apps. Fortunately, alternative methods are here to rescue! I mean understanding and extending the View class.

In this presentation, I will give some Custom View examples. Some of them makes impossible things be possible and some of them increase performance.

I will also talk about how to apply Material Design in Custom Views with the support of older platform versions.
